author: Manoranjan
comment: It was great till latest update. Now it is always reminding to turn it on in accessibility service settings. I obeyed. But the buttons are still appearing on all apps. Hope it will be corrected soon. Thanks.

author: Nayan Chingle
comment: Not working from last update -  On screen volume button not showing after closing this app from background, before that its working perfectly.

reply.author: Claudio Chimera
reply.content: Hi, could you please explain me what is not working?

author: Fernando Fernandez
comment: My volume buttons on phone don't work so this app let's me controls all my volumes from ringtones to media. It's Awesome

author: Kat H4xor
comment: wth it opens default audio panel which is on top of screen and I can't reach it single handedly so I needed a floating panel edit:sorry and thx :3

reply.author: Claudio Chimera
reply.content: Use the setting to show the app volume panel instead of the default one, wich can move around the screen or enable two buttons in order to have volume up/down directly on the screen.

comment: Nice app. Will it work to control alarm, phone volume etc...

author: Isyq Irfan
comment: very useful. im using this app for my mom on her android tv box. work nicely!

author: Jandelle Solanoy
comment: I could not ask for more.

author: pk Negi
comment: Helpfully app thanks

author: hazarat ali
comment: very good

author: Death Rivel9
comment: it hacked my phone sp i had to reset this. dont get it will bother your phone or tablet or watch

reply.author: Claudio Chimera
reply.content: I use this app regularly with LG g5 without problems. I suggest you to not install apps outside the play store.

author: Kamal nath.t.s
comment: It keeps crashing. Please solve this issue, otherwise it's ok

author: H Lønskov
comment: Really great. Volume bar too, just don't let it touch or overlap volume buttons or it'll disappear all the time. Great and most useful app. Thank You. Henry.

author: George Triay
comment: Seems to work better now after the update and the black list is working now too. Thanks for the update

reply.author: Claudio Chimera
reply.content: I've just released an update in beta fixing several bugs. Could you please try it and let me know?

author: Vinay Prasad
comment: Very convenient way to change media volume and works really well. Increses the life span of the volume buttons (if you are that concerned about it)

author: Sonal Paul
comment: Crashing every time, it sucks

author: Kasper Hong
comment: How do you make the virtual button (aka volume icon) available even after restarting your phone?

reply.author: Claudio Chimera
reply.content: If the button is not available after restarting the phone, check the permissions specific to your device. Some devices prevent the app to start at boot. You have to grant the permission manually.

author: WF XU
comment: Really good app to slide control volume, 5 star

author: Swamy Baba
comment: Icon is not appearing on screen when the app is not running..please fix this...or tell me the required settings

reply.author: Claudio Chimera
reply.content: Sorry but if the app is not running, it is impossible to show the icon on the screen.

author: Jakub Kraus
comment: Amazing, does what it should
Love it!

author: failure's point
comment: I love it

author: Ayush Rai
comment: Good

author: Don Armstrong
comment: I have been using this app for a while now. Having floating volume control / mute buttons for selected apps is brilliant. Especially on bigger devices like tablets that are housed in a case. Those volume buttons are a pain. Floating buttons to the rescue! Well done.

author: Abhinav Aggarwal
comment: Updated: that's the quickest possible response from any developer till date, and i update my rating from 4 to 5 purely based on dedication of developer....  Earlier: Excellent concept and liked it very much 2 complaints For volume sidebar option of offset should be provided, right now it falls right in middle of screen, whereas i want it on upper right so that it doesn't comes in way of swiping of images etc which usually happens in middle of screen Secondly automatic restart after rebooting is not happening,....  If these improvements then will be superb

reply.author: Claudio Chimera
reply.content: Hi, the offset of sidebar is in beta and I'm delivery it in next version. The automatic restart on boot is already implemented, if it's not working for your device, please check the device specific settings about that.

author: Robbie Desiato
comment: I'd give it 5 stars if I could remove the icon from the status bar but still leave the controls showing in the notification panel. Also can you make the colours darker so they match the Marshmallow/nougat control panel grey.

author: Bobby Chan
comment: OK but some features do not work on Xiaomi Mi Max 2. Also if only there is a collapse feature.

author: Tracy Wallach
comment: Works very well.  Many options in settings. Suggest setting up the slim, very transparent sidebar. Especially cool with curved screens.. Nice job, app making people !

author: Win Forcambo
comment: Not sure the best but experiencing better performance than other apps of the same kind.

author: Jay P
comment: Works perfectly Everytime. Prevents wear & tear of my volume buttons

author: Anuar Ali
comment: Quite a comprehensive customisation available. If something is not working, contact the developer. They're of much help.

author: jon ono
comment: Thank you. My search is over. Looking long-time for an app that has an on screen volume control. using the 3 slim buttons option is perfect

reply.author: Claudio Chimera
